tags.name: Controller :: KIE Server instances and KIE containers
Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers

tags: Controller :: KIE Server instances and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns all KIE containers for a specified KIE Server template and a specified KIE Server instance

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE Server instance

parameters.name: serverInstanceId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server instance for which you are retrieving KIE containers (example: default-kieserver-instance@localhost:8080)

examples.application/xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<container-details-list>
    <container-details>
        <sever-template-id>test-kie-server</sever-template-id>
        <container-id>evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</container-id>
        <container-name>evaluation</container-name>
        <url>http://localhost:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</url>
        <sever-instance-id>test-kie-server@localhost:8080</sever-instance-id>
        <container-release-id>
            <artifact-id>evaluation</artifact-id>
            <group-id>evaluation</group-id>
            <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </container-release-id>
        <messages>
            <content>Container evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT successfully created with module evaluation:evaluation:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.</content>
            <severity>INFO</severity>
            <timestamp>2018-11-07T05:23:19.713Z</timestamp>
        </messages>
        <status>STARTED</status>
    </container-details>
</container-details-list>

404.description: Kie Server template or Kie Server instance not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server instances and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns all instances of a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template for which you are retrieving KIE containers

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be retrieved

examples.application/xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<container-details-list>
    <container-details>
        <sever-template-id>test-kie-server</sever-template-id>
        <container-id>evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</container-id>
        <container-name>evaluation</container-name>
        <url>http://localhost:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server/containers/evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</url>
        <sever-instance-id>test-kie-server@localhost:8080</sever-instance-id>
        <container-release-id>
            <artifact-id>evaluation</artifact-id>
            <group-id>evaluation</group-id>
            <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </container-release-id>
        <messages>
            <content>Container evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT successfully created with module evaluation:evaluation:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.</content>
            <severity>INFO</severity>
            <timestamp>2018-11-07T05:23:19.713Z</timestamp>
        </messages>
        <status>STARTED</status>
    </container-details>
</container-details-list>

404.description: KIE Server template or KIE container not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server instances and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns all KIE Server instances configured with the controller for a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template for which you are retrieving KIE Server instances

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns information about a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template to be retrieved

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
put.summary: Creates a new KIE Server template with a specified ID

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the new KIE Server template

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A map containing the server-name, capabilities, and other components of the new KIE Server template

examples.application/xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<response type="SUCCESS" msg="Server template sample-server successfully created"/>

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
delete.summary: Deletes a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template to be deleted

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Activates a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be activated

404.description: KIE container or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Deactivates a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be deactivated

404.description: KIE container or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns information about a specified KIE container for a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be retrieved

404.description: Container Specification or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Updates information about a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A map containing the updated specifications for the KIE container

parameters.name: resetBeforeUpdate
parameters.description: Determines whether active processes are aborted (reset) before updating when the server runs in development mode

404.description: KIE Server template or KIE container not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
put.summary: Creates a KIE container in a specified KIE Server template
put.description: You set the KIE container configurations in the request body

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the new KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the new KIE container

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A map containing the container-name, relevant release-id (group ID, artifact ID, and version), configuration specifications (rule, process, planning), and other components of the new KIE container

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
delete.summary: Disposes a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template.

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be disposed

404.description: Container Specification or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Starts a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be started

404.description: KIE container or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Stops a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be stopped

404.description: KIE container or KIE Server template not found

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
get.summary: Returns all KIE containers for a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template for which you are retrieving KIE containers

tags: Controller :: KIE Server templates and KIE containers
post.summary: Updates configurations for a specified KIE container in a specified KIE Server template

parameters.name: serverTemplateId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE Server template associated with the KIE container

parameters.name: containerId
parameters.description: ID of the KIE container to be updated

parameters.name: capability
parameters.description: KIE container capability to be applied (RULE, PROCESS, or PLANNING, case sensitive)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An org.kie.server.controller.api.model.spec.<capability>Config map containing the configurations for the specified KIE container capability, such as runtimeStrategy, kbase, ksession, and mergeMode for process configuration

404.description: KIE container or KIE Server template not found
